title: Hika Ryoujoku: Wana ni Hamatta Futari

alternative_titles.en: Hika Ryoujoku: The Lust of Shame
alternative_titles.ja: 悲花陵辱~罠にはまった義兄妹(ふたり)~

synopsis: Shinichi becomes Megumi's stepbrother after his mother marries Megumi's father. Eventually, Megumi starts to love and regard Shinichi as her older brother. However, their idyllic life will soon turn into a nightmare of lust and debauchery...
